finalize.cname.description: To use Cloudflare without changing your name servers, you must go through an alternate process of creating or editing CNAME records after verifying with Cloudflare that you own the domain. To complete this setup, you must have access to your DNS records and be able to create and edit these records. This is an advanced process and is not recommended for most Cloudflare users.
finalize.cname.subheadline: Log into your registrar account and enter your Cloudflare nameservers.
finalize.cname.title: Finish up
finalize.cname.txt_verification.descript: TXT records contain supplementary information about your domain. You need to do so to prove to Cloudflare that you are the owner of this domain. Add the TXT record that you see below, then click the Verify button. even after verification, do not remove the TXT record at any time.
finalize.cname.txt_verification.title: Create a TXT record
finalize.hosting_partner.error: If %{website} has not yet been activated on Cloudflare, please check with your hosting provider, **%{provider}**.
finalize.nameservers.help:
#### What are nameservers?
Nameservers are the Internet's equivalent to a phone book. When a visitor's computer looks up the domain name for your website, it needs to know where to send that connection. By switching your nameservers to Cloudflare, you are ensuring that all users coming to your website send their traffic through the Cloudflare service.

#### Are two nameservers enough?
Yes. The reason why hosting companies provide multiple nameservers is to improve your global reach and create redundancy in case one of those nameservers goes down.

With Cloudflare, two nameservers are enough because we also propagate your DNS records to all of our data centers worldwide.

**Note:** Only the two Cloudflare nameservers can be used. All other nameservers must be removed otherwise Cloudflare will not work.
finalize.nameservers.notification:
The transfer process can take up to 24 hours. There will be no downtime when you switch your name servers. Traffic will gracefully roll from your old name servers to the new name servers without interruption. Your site will remain available throughout the switch.

It may take up to an additional 24 hours after the transfer is complete for new SSL certificates to be issued for your site.
finalize.nameservers.title: %{website} is registered with %{registrar}
finalize.nameservers.title.unknown: Please visit your registrar's dashboard to change your nameservers to the following.
finalize.registrar.headline: Here are the instructions that you need to follow
finalize.subheadline: Your website will not experience any downtime when you change your nameservers.
finalize.title: Change Your Nameservers

onboarding.teams.access.title: Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA)
onboarding.teams.access.description: Connect any user to any application and private network faster and more securely than a VPN by enforcing identity and context- based rules and limiting lateral movement.
onboarding.teams.gateway.title: Secure Web Gateway (SWG)
onboarding.teams.gateway.description: Block known and unknown Internet threats u2014 and easily control data flows u2014 by enforcing DNS, HTTP, network, and browser isolation rules with unlimited SSL inspection.
onboarding.teams.remote_browser.title: Remote Browser Isolation (RBI)
onboarding.teams.remote_browser.descript: Execute web code in the cloud, not on devices, for unrivaled threat and data protection controls. No pixel pushing or code scrubbing, so it feels like a regular browser.
onboarding.teams.platform.title: Built-From-Scratch Platform
onboarding.teams.platform.description: One unified control plane with single-pane management and single-pass inspection for ZTNA, SWG and RBI that can also replace your VPN, DNS filter and CASB point products.

performance_profile.description: Adjust whether your files are minified or not and how long they are kept in Cloudflare's cache.
performance_profile.help:
#### What does the performance profile do?
##### CDN Only
- Browser cache TTL: 4 hours
- Minification of HTML/CSS/JS: None.

##### CDN + Basic Optimizations
- Browser cache TTL: 1 day
- Minification of HTML/CSS/JS: Yes.

##### CDN + Full Optimizations
- Browser cache TTL: 5 days
- Minification of HTML/CSS/JS: Yes.
performance_profile.title: Performance profile
security_profile.description: Choose the appropriate security profile for your website, which will automatically adjust each of the security settings.
security_profile.help:
#### What does the security profile do?
##### Essentially Off
- Security level: Essentially off
- Challenge TTL: Off.
- Browser integrity check: Off

##### Low
- Security level: Low
- Challenge TTL: 1 week.
- Browser integrity check: Off

##### Medium
- Security level: Medium
- Challenge TTL: 1 hour.
- Browser integrity check: On

##### High
- Security level: High
- Challenge TTL: 15 minutes.
- Browser integrity check: On
security_profile.title: Security profile

onboarding.old_recommendations.descripti: Change your configurations at any time in the Cloudflare dashboard.
onboarding.recommendations_hub.title: Do More With Cloudflare
onboarding.recommendations_hub.descripti: Not sure where to start? Review our recommendations to better protect and optimize your website.
Configure your website settings to improve security, optimize performance, and get the most from your plan.
onboarding.recommendations_hub.config_re: Select from recommendations tailored to your website to improve security and performance.
onboarding.recommendations.config.title: Configuration recommendations
onboarding.recommendations.config.descri: Select from recommendations tailored to your website to improve security and performance. All changes take effect immediately.
onboarding.recommendations.config.always: Redirect all requests with scheme u201Chttpu201D to u201Chttpsu201D. This applies to all http requests to the zone.
onboarding.recommendations.config.automa: Automatic HTTPS Rewrites helps fix mixed content by changing u201Chttpu201D to u201Chttpsu201D for all resources or links on your web site that can be served with HTTPS.
onboarding.recommendations.config.waf.de: Provides enhanced security through a built-in ruleset to stop a wide range of application attacks.
onboarding.recommendations.config.brotli: Speeds up page load times for your visitoru2019s HTTPS traffic.
onboarding.recommendations.config.minify: Reduces the file size of Javascript, CSS, and HTML source code on your website.
onboarding.recommendations.config.polish: Improve image load time by optimizing images hosted on your domain. Optionally, the WebP image codec can be used with supported clients for additional performance benefits.
onboarding.recommendations.config.mirage: Improve load time for pages that include images on mobile devices with slow network connections.
onboarding.recommendations.exit: To exit, <0>go to the overview page</0>.
onboarding.recommendations.title: Quick Start Guide
onboarding.recommendations.description: Configure your domain settings to improve security, optimize performance, and get the most from your account.
onboarding.recommendations.activation.ch: Registrars can take 24 hours to process nameserver updates. You will receive an email when your site is active on Cloudflare.
onboarding.recommendations.security.http: Redirecting all u201Chttpu201D requests to u201Chttpsu201D prevents attackers from tampering with communication between your servers and your users' browsers.
<0>SSL</0> must be enabled in order to use this feature.
onboarding.recommendations.security.rewr: Loading data to your site via HTTPS protects your site from eavesdropping and tampering. This feature will rewrite URLs from u201Chttpu201D to u201Chttpsu201D for all domains that support HTTPS, improving your siteu2019s security.
onboarding.recommendations.security.mana: The Web Application Firewall protects your application by analyzing characteristics from each request and determining how the request should be completed.
A Web Application Firewall (WAF) enhances security by using a built-in ruleset to block requests containing malicious content without impacting your siteu2019s performance.
onboarding.recommendations.performance.p: To optimize your site, the recommended configuration is Lossless selected and WebP checked.
onboarding.recommendations.summary.title: Summary
onboarding.recommendations.card.toggle.m: To better protect your site, the reccommended configuration is ON.
onboarding.recommendations.card.checkbox: To optimize your site, the recommended configuration is enabled for all types.
